title: Metformin impacts the differentiation of mouse bone marrow cells into macrophages affecting tumour immunity
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Andrea Scafidi, Frida Lind-Holm Mogensen, Eleonora Campus, Alexandros Pailas, Katrin Neumann, Nathalie Legrave, François Bernardin, Sandro L.
